page_info.title: Popular Events and Workshops - East West University
page_info.disclaimer: Event details are subject to change as per university announcements

events_workshops.title: World Pharmacists Day 2025 Celebration at EWU
events_workshops.description: On 25 September 2025, the Department of Pharmacy at East West University organized a vibrant day-long program to celebrate World Pharmacists Day.

events_workshops.title: East West University Welcomes Freshers for the Fall Semester 2025
events_workshops.description: East West University (EWU) welcomed approximately 1,800 newly admitted students through a comprehensive Orientation Program for the Fall Semester 2025.

events_workshops.title: East West University Holds Orientation for Leather Goods and Footwear Management Program
events_workshops.description: The Executive Development Center (EDC) at EWU organized an orientation session for the Leather Goods and Footwear Management Program under the SICIP initiative.

events_workshops.title: DCCI and EWU Sign MoC to Strengthen Industry-Academia Collaboration and Foster Entrepreneurship
events_workshops.description: The Dhaka Chamber of Commerce & Industry (DCCI) and East West University (EWU) officially signed a Memorandum of Cooperation to enhance industry-academia collaboration.

events_workshops.title: East West University Successfully Conducts Admission Test for Fall 2025
events_workshops.description: EWU successfully conducted its admission test for the Fall Semester 2025 at the EWU Campus.

events_workshops.title: FGD on GDLFM Program: Job Creation and Employment Opportunities
events_workshops.description: The Executive Development Center (EDC) organized a Focus Group Discussion session titled â€˜FGD on GDLFM Program: Job Creation and Employment Opportunities'.

events_workshops.title: Stepping into the Future: GDLFM Program Makes Strides at BLF Expo 2025
events_workshops.description: The EDC under SICIP at EWU showcased progress of the GDLFM Program at the BLF Expo 2025.

events_workshops.title: East West University Advances Community Legal Literacy through the Street Law Program
events_workshops.description: Street Law initiative by EWU aims to make legal knowledge accessible to the public, especially marginalized communities.

events_workshops.title: Intra-University Programming Contest - Summer 2025
events_workshops.description: The Department of CSE organized the Intra-University Programming Contest - Summer 2025 to promote problem-solving skills among students.

events_workshops.title: Department of Sociology Hosts Seminar on Begum Rokeya's Sultana's Dream
events_workshops.description: The Department of Sociology hosted a seminar to celebrate Begum Rokeya Sakhawat Hossain's seminal feminist work.

events_workshops.title: East West University Hosts Panel Discussion on Harnessing Information Systems for Business in Bangladesh
events_workshops.description: The Department of Business Administration organized a high-profile panel discussion on information systems for business.

events_workshops.title: Teachers' Training Program on 'Teaching, Learning, and Research'
events_workshops.description: A series of training modules were conducted as part of the Teachers' Training Program at EWU.

events_workshops.title: East West University Debating Club Secures Novice Runners-Up Title at Islamic University of Technology Inter Club Debate Tournament 2025
events_workshops.description: EWU Debating Club won the Novice Runners-Up title at the IUT Inter Club Debate Tournament 2025.

events_workshops.title: National Final of the Astro-Olympiad Selection Held at East West University
events_workshops.description: The Bangladesh Astronomical Association (BAA) concluded the final selection phase of its annual 'Astro-Olympiad' talent search program at EWU.

events_workshops.title: Workshop On 'Language of the Image' by Nayem Ali organized by East West University Photography Club
events_workshops.description: EWU Photography Club successfully organized a workshop titled 'Language of the Image' by Nayem Ali.
